page.title: 07ROLAND RAT
page.content: ROLAND RAT IS A{T.V.CHARACTER}AND HE APPEARS ON T.V.AM,A BREAKFAST T.V. PROGRAMME.HE IS A RAT AND HE IS A SUPERSTAR.HE HAS OTHER PEOPLE WITH HIM AND THEY ARE,KEVIN THE GERBIL AND ERROL THE HAMPSTER AND THERE IS A NEW ONE AND HER NAME IS GLENYS.SHE IS THE ONLY GIRL IN IT,BECAUSE ROLAND AND KEVIN AND ERROL ARE BOTH BOYS.GLENYS IS A GUINEA PIG.ROLAND RAT CAN NOT SPELL VERY WELL AND HE ALSO CAN NOT WRITE VERY WELL AT ALL.I THINK THEY ARE ALL VERY NICE AND I AM IN THE OFFICAL WORLD WIDE ROLAND RAT APPRECIATION SOCIETY AND I WRITE TO HIM REGULARLY AND SEND HIM A BIRTHDAY CARD FOR HIS BIRTHDAY AND A CHRISTMAS CARD FOR CHRISTMAS.
